[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/grid-pro](./grid-pro.md) &gt; [GridPro](./grid-pro.gridpro.md) &gt; [paginationPageSize](./grid-pro.gridpro.paginationpagesize.md)

## GridPro.paginationPageSize property

Number of rows per page when pagination is enabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
paginationPageSize: number;
```

## Remarks

\*\*Default Value:\*\* `DatasourceDefaults.DEFAULT_PAGINATION_PAGE_SIZE (25)` (default MAX\_ROWS divided by 10) Only used when pagination is enabled. Note that AG Grid's full pagination functionality requires the Enterprise module.
